sentences.sContent: In 1666 the English parliament cited his atheism as the probably cause of the plague and the fire of London.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1666 the English parliament cited his atheism as the probably cause of the plague and the fire of London.
sentences.sCn: 可能是由于瘟疫的爆发和伦敦的火灾,1666年英国国会开始引用他的无神论。

remMethod.val: a(无) + the(神) + ism → 无神论

words.tran: 无神论的，不信神的；无神论者的

trans.tranOther: the belief that God does not exist
